title: Shaun’s secrets
text: This months secret is the balena tunnel command in our CLI and it’s newly added ability to map any port on your laptops localhost to any port on your remote balenaOS device. This is super useful if you want scp data to your device or have something like RealVNC viewer running in your container and don’t want use the standard port 80 or 8080. You can learn more about balena tunnel in our documentation here.
